id: rules.morning check.returns morning services.time.6 am - 8 am
rules.morning check.returns morning services.condition.when 10 services have low status
rules.afternoon check.returns afternoon services.time.9 am - 12 pm
rules.afternoon check.returns afternoon services.time.1 pm - 5 pm
rules.afternoon check.returns afternoon services.condition.when trucks deployed >= 10
rules.evening check.returns evening services.time.12 pm - 5 am
rules.evening check.returns evening services.time.6 pm - 5 am
rules.evening check.returns evening services.condition.when services < 5 && trucks deployed >= 6
rules.evening check.returns evening services.condition.when services <= 4 || trucks deployed <= 2

rules.evening check.routine check.condition.when services < 5 && trucks deployed > 5
